bibl.title: The Late Roman Auditoria of Alexandria: An Archaeological Overview.

series.title: The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII

bibl.note: Topography. - Architecture and construction of the auditoria. - Interior arrangement. - Chonology [Vth-VIth centuries]. - Auditorium function. - School buildings in antiquity. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education

bibl.seg: MAJCHEREK Grzegorz, The Late Roman Auditoria of Alexandria: An Archaeological Overview.

Tomasz DERDA, Tomasz MARKIEWICZ and Ewa WIPSZYCKA (Edd.), Alexandria. Auditoria of Kom el-Dikka and Late Antique Education = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VIII (Warsaw, 2007) pp. 11-50, 27 figg. coul., 2 plans.
Topography. - Architecture and construction of the auditoria. - Interior arrangement. - Chonology [Vth-VIth centuries]. - Auditorium function. - School buildings in antiquity. - Conclusions.
